DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study ass whether interaction statin , acetylsalicylic acid ( ASA ) dutasteride protection prostate cancer , development high grade prostate cancer , low urinary tract symptom .
DOC.brief_title: Combination Statin , Acetylsalicylic Acid Dutasteride Use Prostate Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: A review data collect REDUCE ( REduction DUtasteride prostate Cancer Events ) study participant perform . Data require analysis include : ethnicity , prostate specific antigen ( PSA ) level , prostate volume , presence diabetes , concomitant medication use ( statin ASA ) , prostate biopsy result 2 4 year , body mass index ( BMI ) , digital rectal exam ( DRE ) result , family history Prostate Cancer benign prostatic hyperplasia ( BPH ) outcomes : urinary retention , international prostate symptom score ( IPSS ) , urinary tract infection ( UTI ) s. The association drug interaction prostate cancer explore use multivariate logistic regression model include possible interaction term dutasteride , ASA statins ( i.e . statin+ASA+dutasteride , statin+ASA , dutasteride+statin , dutasteride+ASA ) . Any interaction term find insignificant ( i.e . p > 0.05 ) remove model . If statistically significant interaction term identify , study cohort stratify drug use , relative risk ( RR ) prostate cancer among different drug user report . To control potential confounders , multivariate regression model construct adjusting age , family history prostate cancer , DRE result BMI .
DOC.criteria: Participants receive dutasteride placebo least one postbaseline prostate biopsy Participants take concomitant statin ASA
